name: Level 2 - Swim Class
description: This class builds on the basic aquatic skills and water safety skills and concepts learned in Level 1. Participants begin to perform skills at a slightly more advanced level and begin gaining rudimentary propulsive skills on both the front and the back. This level marks the beginning of independent aquatic locomotion skills. Prerequisite: Successful completion of Level 1. Children must be 48" to participate. Registration is limited to one swim class per participant.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (415) 831-6800
keywords: we are a family with children under 18 years old.
i am part of a family with children under 18 years old.
